alert.note: Alert for Steuben; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 5:04PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Yates and north central Steuben Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 504 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wayland, or 7 miles northeast of Dansville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Penn Yan, Benton, Potter, Wayland, Dundee, Middlesex, Italy, Rushville, Dresden and Guyanoga. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 390 near 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
